tool.name: MEME-ChIP
tool.command:
meme-chip $input_file -o ${memechip_out.files_path} #for p in str.split($motif_dbs.fields.path,","): -db $p #end for
#if str( $options_type.options_type_selector ) == 'advanced': #if str( $options_type.bg_type.bg_type_selector) == 'bg_user': -bfile "${ str( $options_type.bg_type.bfile ) }" #end if
#if str( $options_type.nmeme) != '-1': -nmeme "${ str( $options_type.nmeme ) }" #end if
#if str( $options_type.ccut ) != '-1': -ccut "${ str( $options_type.ccut ) }" #end if
#if str( $options_type.time ) != '-1': -time "${ str( $options_type.time ) }" #end if
-desc "${ str( $options_type.desc ) }"
#if str( $options_type.meme_mod ) != '': -meme-mod "${ str($options_type.meme_mod) }" #end if
#if str( $options_type.meme_minw ) != '-1': -meme-minw "${ str($options_type.meme_minw) }" #end if
#if str( $options_type.meme_maxw ) != '-1': -meme-maxw "${ str($options_type.meme_maxw) }" #end if
#if str( $options_type.meme_nmotifs ) != '-1': -meme-nmotifs "${ str($options_type.meme_nmotifs) }" #end if
#if str( $options_type.meme_minsites ) != '-1': -meme-minsites "${ str($options_type.meme_minsites) }" #end if
#if str( $options_type.meme_maxsites ) != '-1': -meme-maxsites "${ str($options_type.meme_maxsites) }" #end if
#if $options_type.meme_pal: -meme-pal "${ str($options_type.meme_pal) }" #end if
#if str( $options_type.dreme_e ) != '-1.0': -dreme-e "${ str($options_type.dreme_e) }" #end if
#if str( $options_type.dreme_m ) != '-1': -dreme-m "${ str($options_type.dreme_m) }" #end if
#if str($options_type.centrimo_score) != '-1.0': -centrimo-score "${ str($options_type.centrimo_score) }" #end if
#if str( $options_type.centrimo_maxreg ) != '-1': -centrimo-maxreg "${ str($options_type.centrimo_maxreg) }" #end if
#if str( $options_type.centrimo_ethresh ) != '-1.0': -centrimo-ethresh "${ str($options_type.centrimo_ethresh) }" #end if
#if $options_type.centrimo_noseq: -centrimo-noseq #end if
#end if
2>&1 || echo "Error running MEME."
&& cd ${memechip_out.files_path} && zip -rp memechip_out ./ && mv memechip_out.zip ${memechip_out}

param.name: input_file
param.label: Sequences in fasta format

param.name: motif_dbs
param.label: MEME Motif databases
param.help: Use CTRL to select multiple databases

validator.message: No indexes are available for the selected dataset

param.name: non_commercial_use
param.label: I certify that I am not using this tool for commercial purposes.

validator.message: This tool is only available for non-commercial use.

param.name: options_type_selector
param.label: Options Configuration

param.name: bg_type_selector
param.label: Custom background

param.name: bfile
param.label: -bfile: Background File

param.name: nmeme
param.label: -nmeme: limit of sequences to pass to MEME; -1: Default behaviour

param.name: ccut
param.label: -ccut: Max size of a seq before it is cut down; 0: do not cut; -1: Default behaviour

param.name: time
param.label: -time: Maximum time (minutes) that this program has to run and create output in; -1: no limit

param.name: desc
param.label: -desc: Description of the analysis

param.name: meme_mod
param.label: -meme-mod: Sites used in a single sequence

param.name: meme_minw
param.label: -meme-minw: minimum motif width; -1: Default behaviour

param.name: meme_maxw
param.label: -meme-maxw: maximum motif width; -1: Default behaviour

param.name: meme_nmotifs
param.label: -meme-nmotifs: maximum number of motifs to find; -1: Default behaviour

param.name: meme_minsites
param.label: -meme-minsites: minimum number of sites per motif; -1: Default behaviour

param.name: meme_maxsites
param.label: -meme-maxsites: maximum number of sites per motif; -1: Default behaviour

param.name: meme_pal
param.label: -meme-pal: look for palindromes only

param.name: dreme_e
param.label: -dreme-e: stop searching after reaching this E-value threshold; -1: Default behaviour

param.name: dreme_m
param.label: -dreme-e: stop searching after finding this many motifs; -1: Default behaviour

param.name: centrimo_score
param.label: -centrimo-score: set the minimum allowed match score; -1: Default behaviour

param.name: centrimo_maxreg
param.label: -centrimo-maxreg: set the maximum region size to be considered; -1: Default behaviour

param.name: centrimo_ethresh
param.label: -centrimo-ethresh: set the E-value threshold for reporting; -1: Default behaviour

param.name: centrimo_noseq
param.label: -centrimo-noseq: don't store sequence IDs in the output

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
After the job finishes, save the zip file, unzip and open "index.html"
The actual meme-chip command is displayed under "Command line summary"
Defaults: http://meme.nbcr.net/meme/doc/meme-chip.html
